definition.name: NXcollectioncolumn
definition.doc: Draft subclass of NXelectronanalyser to describe the electron collection column of a photoelectron analyser.

symbols.doc: The symbols used in the schema to specify e.g. dimensions of arrays

symbol.doc: Number of lenses in the collection column
symbol.name: nl

field.name: scheme
field.doc: Scheme of the electron collection lens, i.e. standard, deflector, PEEM, momentum microscope, etc.

field.name: extractor_voltage
field.doc: Voltage applied to the extractor lens

field.name: extractor_current
field.doc: Indicating leakage, field emission or arc currents to the extractor lens

field.name: working_distance
field.doc: Distance between sample and detector entrance

field.name: lens_names
field.doc: Set of names of electron optic lenses

field.name: projection
field.doc: The space projected in the angularly dispersive directions, real or reciprocal

field.name: magnification
field.doc: The magnification of the projected image in the angularly dispersive direction

group.name: field_aperture
group.doc: The size and position of the field aperture inserted in the column

group.name: contrast_aperture
group.doc: The size and postion of the contrast aperture inserted in the column.

group.name: DEFLECTOR
group.doc: deflectors in the collection column section

group.name: LENS
group.doc: Individual lenses in the collection column section
